price: 118. Oo ku hanuuninnay Jidka Toosan (ee Islaamka)12;
footnotes: 12. Jidka toosan waa diinta Islaamka, waana diinta uu Alle la soo diray nabiyada oo dhan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

translations: And We guided both of them
